column1: On behalf of the American people
column2: THANK YOU to our incredible law enforcement officers. As President of the United States - I will fight for you
column6: we must support the men and women in blue! #LawEnforcementAppreciationDay https://t.co/Qb4uxB4JRm

column1: We are fighting for our farmers
column3: and for our GREAT AMERICAN FLAG. We want our flag respected - and we want our NATIONAL ANTHEM respected also! https://t.co/16eOLXg6Fi

column2: we are honoring America’s PROUD FARMING LEGACY. Years of crushing taxes
column4: & corrupt politics left our communities hurting
column6: & millions of hardworking Americans COMPLETELY FORGOTTEN. But they are not forgotten ANYMORE! https://t.co/MdYS7xnukQ

column1: We have been working every day to DELIVER for America’s Farmers just as they work every day to deliver FOR US. #AFBF18 https://t.co/QDH7fvFkZ7

Can’t wait to be back in the amazing state of Tennessee to address the 99th American @FarmBureau Federation’s Annual Convention in Nashville! #AFBF18 On my way now - join me LIVE at 4:00pmE: https://t.co/QaljAqekdD. https://t.co/Wm7Io0hYT8
